Renamed functions in DemoTools

Source: R/Defunct.R
DemoTools-renamed.Rd

These functions still work but will be removed (defunct) in the next version.

Details

  • monoCloseout: This function is now called graduate_mono_closeout.

  • splitMono: This function is now called graduate_mono.

  • grabill: This function is now called graduate_grabill.

  • sprague: This function is now called graduate_sprague.

  • beers: This function is now called graduate_beers.

  • splitUniform: This function is now called graduate_uniform.

  • aomegaMortalityLaws: This function is now called lt_a_closeout.

  • lx2dx: This function is now called lt_id_l_d.

  • Lx2Tx: This function is now called lt_id_L_T.

  • Lx2Tx: This function is now called lt_id_L_T.

  • Lxlx2Sx: This function is now called lt_id_Ll_S.

  • qx2lx: This function is now called lt_id_q_l.

  • mxax2qx: This function is now called lt_id_ma_q.

  • mx2qx: This function is now called lt_id_ma_q.

  • mxax2qx_Backstop: This function is now called lt_id_ma_q.

  • qxax2mx: This function is now called lt_id_qa_m.

  • mxorqx2ax: This function is now called lt_id_morq_a.

  • axUN: This function is now called lt_a_un.

  • axPAS: This function is now called lt_a_pas.

  • extra.mortality: This function is now called lt_rule_m_extrapolate.
